Changes.Message: Fixed multiple bugs in the usage analytics feature
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- Fixed a bug where usage analytics feature missed time frame for data collection
- Fixed a bug where usage analytics feature prevented the service from stopping gracefully

Changes.Message: Fixed a soundness issue during worker startup, where workers could be killed while serving requests leading to corrupt extraction states in the worst case.
Fixed an issue where input of decimal values was not possible
Fixed a bug where OHS data packages would not correctly communicate their size.
Fixed a bug where error information would not be handled correctly by the server causing broken responses or missing error information.

Fixed parallelization issues during extraction initialization. This disables multiple extractions running in the same process. Any subsequent extraction request will wait. Improved logging in the config server. Create, update and delete operations for most objects will now be logged.
Reworked error handling during extraction cancellation. A new state for extractions is introduced: 'Cancelled'. Fixed logging for the extraction cancellation.
Fix for failing extractions for some SAP systems.
General availability of Xtract Core. Contact Theobald Software sales at https://theobald-software.com/en/contact/ for more information.
